message.content:
{"id": "49536", 
"title": "If no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404", 
"description": "When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of returning an HTTP error 404. This issue occurs when using the downloaded Apache Tomcat 7.0.0beta binary package from the URL: http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.", 
"OB": "When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404, indicating that the requested resource is not found.", 
"EB": "When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server incorrectly returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of returning an HTTP error 404.", 
"SR": "Ensure that when there are no webapps deployed, the Tomcat 7 instance returns an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL instead of returning an HTTP code 200 OK with no content."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49536', 'title': 'Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404', 'description': 'Ali Tokmenhttp://ali.tokmen.com/ ', 'OB': "Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': "HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. "}
